html: 8.24.20  12:22 pm   When you have a good chorus, what's a good way to come up with a fitting but different enough verse, and vice *verse*a?
8.24.20  12:13 pm   What made I'm Crazy / It's Raining such a good song?
8.24.20  11:39 am   I am about to go to my third semester of music theory. DO you have any advice for me?
8.24.20  11:14 am   Apparently I get too distracted too often. Do you know a good way to get undistracted for a while?
8.24.20  10:29 am   Are you Canadian
8.24.20  10:11 am   What happens at the airplane terminal?
8.24.20  9:58 am   DID YOUR "SHIFT" KEY BROKE AND THATS WHY YOU ONLY USE LOWERCASE also mine didnt broke as this lowercase sentence proves
8.24.20  9:55 am   What's the best type of cereal?
8.24.20  9:45 am   whats the worst idea of a song you have considered
8.24.20  9:34 am   Do you write your lyrics or decide the melody first?

8.24.20  9:04 am   I love the idea of the shortest first strategy, but until I heard your music I just didn't even know a song could be only seconds long. But of course it can! So my question is... how did YOU come to realise that songs could be that short or was it always obvious?
8.24.20  8:22 am   Will you continue working on the reality section of your website?
8.24.20  6:37 am   is the earth flat?
8.24.20  5:34 am   Whenever I feel sad I listen to your songs, they make me feel good, safe, like someone is there to give me some hope. Thank you Bill
8.24.20  5:34 am   What's your opinion on how creativity is affected by some type of restriction to the creative process?

8.24.20  5:27 am   Hey Bill, I gotta ask a question. So, in high school I played football and as a result my fingers aren't especially dexterous anymore. I really want to get into making music though, what instrument would you suggest becoming familiar with?
8.24.20  4:50 am   what's Steve's real name
8.24.20  4:25 am   what advice would you give to someone who wants to be like you one day
8.24.20  4:14 am   what music do you listen to?
8.24.20  4:12 am   Hey Bill, do you agree with me that we should switch to ternary numeral system (base 3)?
8.24.20  3:57 am   I feel like beavers are more intelligent than boomerangs. Can you confirm if my hypothesis is right?
8.24.20  3:45 am   Are you gonna make a song about the pandemic?
8.24.20  3:23 am   Was any soap harmed in the making of your soap tips video?
8.24.20  3:21 am   what's your favorite shape
8.24.20  3:06 am   What's the new video gonna be about?
8.24.20  2:33 am   what was your favourite song that you made?
8.24.20  2:32 am   Hey ur a pretty cool dude that makes pretty cool vids. When can we expect some more bangers?
8.24.20  2:31 am   Hi Bill One day I was watching you explaining your lyrics in 'Mount St. Helens Is About to Blow Up'. What were you thinking while writing the song?

8.24.20  2:09 am   My family loves me, but they don't seem to really fully understand me or know me for who i am, and their judgements make me doubt myself and feel boxed in no matter what. How do I stop this and truly thrive as myself? I feel like the vision of life I'd found once was amazing, truly beautiful, but now I'm just filled with doubts and worries and devoid of wonder and love and fun. I don't want to grow up and live a typical life and die having wasted my time to make change on this earth.
8.24.20  1:49 am   When you're in graphic/video learning mode like now

8.24.20  1:23 am   thoughts on the practical application of acronyms in everyday conversation?

8.24.20  1:04 am   How is it that you maintain your status as a cool dude at all times

8.23.20  10:46 pm   In the song "When i'm get older", what does the lyric that said " Then the song will sing me" mean?

8.23.20  10:31 pm   how can i accept the fact that not everything i create can be a masterpiece? the pressure to create something spectacular, something that truly lives up to the splendor i have in my mind, is debilitating.
8.23.20  10:12 pm   you talk about how you are small in a few of your songs.
8.23.20  10:05 pm   i've been fed the idea that i have to be special/exceptional, but just being myself is hard enough
